entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The specified RuntimeIdentifier 'linux-linux/amd64' is not recognized #31616
  • IAsyncEnumerable on .NET 7 #31614
  • warning NETSDK1179 is a mistranslation in the Korean environment. #31592

Closed

  • Unable to download https://dotnetcli.azureedge.net/dotnet/Sdk/6.0.407/dotnet-dev-win-x64.6.0.407.zip #31580

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2150801 #31622
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prep 7.0.3xx for GA release #31618
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31617
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add implementation and test for add Trademark assembly attribute #31611
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Update branding to 6.0.117 #31602
  • Respond to ProduceReferenceAssembly default changing to true #31598
    untriaged
  • [WIP do no review yet] Use MSBuild Server in interactive mode only #31597
    Area-CLI
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31595
    untriaged
  • Remove reference to the VS preview flag in the developer guide #31593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Killbit BinaryFormatter across most .NET 8 project types #31591
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.11.2 to 19.12.0 in /eng/dependabot #31577
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • Update the hardcoded to the current TFM #31594
    untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.409 #31604
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.106 #31605
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.204 #31606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.312 #31603
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reenable a skipped cppcli test. #31386
    untriaged
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31511
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Updated

  • Move asset compression to the StaticWebAssets SDK #31559
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.11.2 to 19.12.0 in /eng/dependabot #31576
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • add --create-manifest-if-needed flag #31231
    Area-Tools
  • extend search table with trusted and owners info #31403
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add the test that verifies generated join symbol with Ref to derived symbol can be evaluated correctly #31564
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #31581
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
